Simple Treatments.--Canvassers should be able to give instruction in regard to the treatment of the sick. They should learn the simple methods of hygienic treatment. Thus they may work as medical missionaries, ministering to the souls and the bodies of the suffering. This work should now be going forward in all parts of the 
                                                                           90
world. Thus multitudes might be blessed by the prayers and instruction of God's servants.--Testimonies, vol. 6, p. 324.
